titleStmt.title: The sober man's vindication, discovering the true cause and manner how Dr. Chamberlen came to be reported mad: which scandal they propagated throughout England, Wales and Ireland, and the same false report was met with in Scotland, France and the low countries.
titleStmt.author: Chamberlen, Peter, 1601-1683.

notesStmt.note: At end: "From my cottage over against the Low Conduit by the Church in Coleman-street, 1662.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
